subNode:value.scalar:string: Sends e-mail notifications to customers and merchants.
Are you sure you want to delete all customer notifications?

` ( `id_customer` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `customer_email` varchar(128) NOT NULL, `id_product` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `id_product_attribute` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `id_shop` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `id_lang` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id_customer`,`customer_email`,`id_product`,`id_product_attribute`,`id_shop`) ) ENGINE=
Please type one (or more) e-mail address
Gives the customer the option of receiving a notification for an available product if this one is out of stock.
Receive a notification when an order is placed
Receive a notification if the available quantity of a product is below the following threshold
Quantity for which a product is considered out of stock
Receive a notification if the stock coverage of a product is below the following coverage
Stock coverage, in days. Also, the stock coverage of a given product will be calculated based on this number
</label> <div class="margin-form"> <div style="float:left; margin-right:10px;"> <textarea name="ma_merchant_mails" rows="10" cols="40">
One e-mail address per line (e.g. bob@example.com)
